name: Apothecary, Inc.
description: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.
one_liner: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.

name: Beaubble
description: Beauty brand incubator enabling celebrities and creators to monetize their IP by launching and distributing authentic beauty brands. The platform streamlines brand development, product creation, and distribution, reducing barriers such as high upfront costs and long time to market while ensuring scalability.
one_liner: Beauty brand incubator enabling celebrities and creators to monetize their IP by launching and distributing authentic beauty brands. The platform streamlines brand development, product creation, and distribution, reducing barriers such as high upfront costs and long time to market while ensuring scalability.

name: Brazil B2Beauty, Ltd.
description: Operator of an online marketplace designed to offer beauty and salon services to people. The company's marketplace offers a location-based platform and mobile application that helps users to look up and schedule appointments with beauty-service providers in their cities as well as helps service providers to find their customers, enabling users to find the salon of their choice and their desired service provider within their city.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace designed to offer beauty and salon services to people. The company's marketplace offers a location-based platform and mobile application that helps users to look up and schedule appointments with beauty-service providers in their cities as well as helps service providers to find their customers, enabling users to find the salon of their choice and their desired service provider within their city.

name: Circulo de Belleza LLC
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer beauty products. The company's platform operates an online store with exclusive sales for beauty salons and industry professionals with delivery coverage to modernize the supply of beauty and aesthetic salons and open new clients to the leading brands in the industry, enabling customers to receive quality products around the clock at competitive prices and save time.
one_liner: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer beauty products. The company's platform operates an online store with exclusive sales for beauty salons and industry professionals with delivery coverage to modernize the supply of beauty and aesthetic salons and open new clients to the leading brands in the industry, enabling customers to receive quality products around the clock at competitive prices and save time.

name: GoWabi (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an online beauty service portal intended to assist in booking appointments for spas and massages. The company's portal permits users to find a salon near them and book their appointment accordingly as well as offers cashback on every booking made to redeem for a cash discount, enabling users to search for top service providers of beauty and wellness all over Thailand and book online with discounts.
one_liner: Operator of an online beauty service portal intended to assist in booking appointments for spas and massages. The company's portal permits users to find a salon near them and book their appointment accordingly as well as offers cashback on every booking made to redeem for a cash discount, enabling users to search for top service providers of beauty and wellness all over Thailand and book online with discounts.

name: SAIB & Co. Inc.
description: Manufacturer of intimate cosmetics intended to tackle the entrenched cultural taboos around female sexuality. The company's offerings include sexual wellness products like a condom made from plant latex without unnecessary additives and artificial pigments designed from the perspective of women, enabling women to feel comfortable and proud to carry them without any shame or stigma.
one_liner: Manufacturer of intimate cosmetics intended to tackle the entrenched cultural taboos around female sexuality. The company's offerings include sexual wellness products like a condom made from plant latex without unnecessary additives and artificial pigments designed from the perspective of women, enabling women to feel comfortable and proud to carry them without any shame or stigma.
industry: Beauty, CPG (Consumer packaged goods), FemTech (women's health), Wellness, Social Impact

name: Socialee Inc
description: Developer of a video commerce platform designed to connect beauty content creators & consumers, through honest product reviews. The company combines an authentic product discovery experience with an e-commerce service that acts as a single destination to discover and learn about products through 60 to 90-second shoppable videos from friends, creators and brands, enabling users to get real reviews from real people, authentic beauty experts and their friends.
one_liner: Developer of a video commerce platform designed to connect beauty content creators & consumers, through honest product reviews. The company combines an authentic product discovery experience with an e-commerce service that acts as a single destination to discover and learn about products through 60 to 90-second shoppable videos from friends, creators and brands, enabling users to get real reviews from real people, authentic beauty experts and their friends.

name: Stylemyle Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended for contemporary luxury fashion to sell dynamically-priced overstock collections. The company's platform offers apparel like dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, workwear, and accessories like shoes, bags, belts, hats, gloves, and jewelry, enabling luxury boutiques and designers to turn unsold inventory into sales.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended for contemporary luxury fashion to sell dynamically-priced overstock collections. The company's platform offers apparel like dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, workwear, and accessories like shoes, bags, belts, hats, gloves, and jewelry, enabling luxury boutiques and designers to turn unsold inventory into sales.

name: StyleSeat, Inc.
description: Operator of the premier marketplace for independent beauty professionals intended to empower professionals and connect them with clients. The company offers seamless booking and business management tools, enabling clients to discover and book beauty services with ease while allowing professionals to manage their businesses and grow their clientele.
one_liner: Operator of the premier marketplace for independent beauty professionals intended to empower professionals and connect them with clients. The company offers seamless booking and business management tools, enabling clients to discover and book beauty services with ease while allowing professionals to manage their businesses and grow their clientele.

name: Wei Labs SAS Corp
description: Developer of a software application designed for operational and financial management of beauty businesses in Latin America. The company's application offers a booking button to Instagram profile, set up a website that showcases services and make it easy for clients to pay for their appointments with the app's wallet, enabling businesses to increase revenue.
one_liner: Developer of a software application designed for operational and financial management of beauty businesses in Latin America. The company's application offers a booking button to Instagram profile, set up a website that showcases services and make it easy for clients to pay for their appointments with the app's wallet, enabling businesses to increase revenue.
